text: Columbus is a city in Lowndes County Mississippi. It is also the county seat of Lowndes County. The population was 24,084 at the 2020 census. The explorer Hernando de Soto. spent the winter of 1540â€“41 with the Chickasaw tribe camped near what is now the city of Columbus.Gloria A. Young; Michael P. Hoffman, Expedition of Hernando de Soto West of the Mississippi, 1541-1543 (Fayetteville: University of Arkansas Press, 1993), p. 40 == References == Category:Cities in Mississippi Category:Settlements in Lowndes County, Mississippi Category:County seats in Mississippi Category:1820s establishments in Mississippi Category:1821 establishments in Mississippi
title: Columbus, Mississippi
